heading: HR00233
0: RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON WOMEN AND GENDER EQUALITY TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE POSSIBLE DISCRIMINATORY INCIDENT, THAT HAPPENED INSIDE A MALL, ON THE BASIS OF SEXUAL ORIENTATION OR GENDER IDENTITY INVOLVING THE DENIAL OF ACCESS TO A LADIES' RESTROOM TO TRANSGENDER WOMAN GRETCHEN CUSTODIO DIEZ WITH THE ACCOMPANYING INSTRUCTION TO HER USE THE RESTROOM OF MALES INSTEAD
status: Pending with the Committee on WOMEN AND GENDER EQUALITY since 2019-11-27
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00233
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON WOMEN AND GENDER EQUALITY TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE POSSIBLE DISCRIMINATORY INCIDENT, THAT HAPPENED INSIDE A MALL, ON THE BASIS OF SEXUAL ORIENTATION OR GENDER IDENTITY INVOLVING THE DENIAL OF ACCESS TO A LADIES' RESTROOM TO TRANSGENDER WOMAN GRETCHEN CUSTODIO DIEZ WITH THE ACCOMPANYING INSTRUCTION TO HER USE THE RESTROOM OF MALES INSTEAD

DATE FILED : 2019-08-14
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
